author: samwilsn
content:
How would other editors feel about having one of the bots replace the PR description with a standardized template?

A lot of authors seem to keep the template text, which is kinda annoying. I wouldn't mind seeing the `discussions-to` link and maybe a few other summary items.

author: samwilsn
content: <@!543900561460822016> https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4417 <- safe to approve? Do we have to wait for the author?

author: lightclient
content: generally we don't merge these types of requests w/o approval from the author

author: samwilsn
content: And if the author doesn't reply?

author: lightclient
content: then the change doesn't usually get merged
